string.text: A backpack made of durable material able to withstand the most harsh weather conditions.
A sleeping bag. The zone is not a safe place to sleep.
A durable backpack with various pouches and compartments equipped with quick release clips; giving the ability to drop the field kit at a moment's notice.

This kit contains oils, mechanical tools used for basic maintaining and some small weapon spare parts.\nAll metal items required to fix moderately damaged firearms to a functioning condition if you know your way around weapon mechanics.\nIt's a heavy kit but it can be very helpful when exploring deep into The Zone with basic equipment.
